Getting Started

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Dicta, est nisi? Minus totam voluptas, repellat ratione quisquam cumque eos, a perspiciatis saepe expedita incidunt sit repellendus vel inventore, nobis distinctio.

Quick Start

The easiest way to get started with our templates is to copy the code for the Starter Template and paste it into your course files.

<!doctype html><head><meta charset="utf-8"><meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"><!--[if lt IE 9]><script src="http://html5shiv.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/html5.js"></script><![endif]--><link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Lato:400,700|Lora:400,700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet"><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://pimaonline.netlify.app/css/themes/cards/styles.css"><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="css/custom.css"><title>Starter Template</title></head><body><header class="header"><img src="https://via.placeholder.com/1920X600" alt=""><div class="text-container"><h1>Course Intro</h1><p>Donec sollicitudin molestie malesuada. Nulla porttitor accumsan tincidunt. Proin eget tortor risus. Pellentesque in ipsum id orci porta.</p></div></header><div id="content-wrapper"><div class="content-body"><h2>Welcome to [course name here]</h2><p>Curabitur aliquet quam id dui posuere blandit. Curabitur non nulla sit amet nisl tempus convallis quis ac lectus. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nulla quis lorem ut libero malesuada feugiat. Vivamus suscipit tortor eget felis porttitor volutpat. Vivamus magna justo, lacinia eget consectetur sed, convallis at tellus. Proin eget tortor risus. Donec rutrum congue leo eget malesuada.</p></div></div><footer><div id="footer"><p class="text-center toggle-footnotes">[Show Footnotes]</p><div class="footnotes"><p>Vivamus suscipit tortor eget felis porttitor volutpat. Curabitur arcu erat, accumsan id imperdiet et, porttitor at sem. Vivamus magna justo, lacinia eget consectetur sed, convallis at tellus.</p><ul><li>Lorem culim ghus.</li><li>Ipsum guar havana.</li></ul></div></div></footer><script type="text/javascript" src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.3.1.min.js"></script><script type="text/javascript" href="https://pimaonline.netlify.app/js/scripts.js"></script></body></html>

Manual Setup

For a more custom approach, follow these steps to manually install the template system.

  • CSS: Include the stylesheet by copying the code below and adding it in <head> before all other stylesheets. 
    <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="https://pimaonline.netlify.app/css/themes/cards/styles.css">
  • JS: Include the scripts.js file by adding the following code immediately before </body>. 
    <script type="text/javascript" href="https://pimaonline.netlify.app/js/scripts.js"></script>
  • jQuery: Include jQuery by adding the following code immediately before </body>. 
    <script type="text/javascript" href="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.3.1.min.js"></script>

Community

You can reach out to your fellow IDs and supervisors for assistance, or to the PimaOnline Web Team. We're your friendly neighborhood WDs and are always ready to help you troubleshoot any issues!
